project_521_pilot.title: Project 521 - Pilot Episode
project_521_pilot.description: The pilot episode introducing the Project 521 research team and the discovery that will change everything.
project_521_pilot.logline: When a Mars research team discovers encrypted data in alien artifacts, they must decide whether to pursue the truth or protect humanity from what they might find.

act1.description: Introduce team, establish normal research operations, discovery of the capsule

act2.description: Initial analysis reveals intentional origins, team dynamics and conflicts emerge

act3.description: First hints of simulation evidence, consequences begin to manifest

project_521_pilot.notes: Pilot should establish the scientific credibility while building toward the supernatural elements

foundation_origins.title: The Foundation Origins
foundation_origins.description: Flashback episode revealing Aya Stone's childhood and the Foundation's historical manipulation.
foundation_origins.logline: Through flashbacks, we see how Aya Stone's traumatic upbringing created the idealistic tyrant who now threatens human consciousness.

act1.description: Present day Aya making crucial decision, flashback to childhood academy

act2.description: Aya's academy training, mentor's disappearance, relationship with Bjorn

act3.description: Adult Aya's Foundation takeover, parallel with childhood trauma patterns

foundation_origins.notes: Character study showing how good intentions can become authoritarian control

twin_revelation.title: Divided Loyalties
twin_revelation.description: The Washington twins discover each other's existence, forcing them to question everything they believe.
twin_revelation.logline: When identical twins serving opposite sides of a conspiracy meet for the first time, they must choose between ideology and family.

act1.description: Parallel scenes of Sara and Sierra performing similar duties for different masters

act2.description: Investigation leads to discovery, first confrontation between twins

act3.description: Identity crisis and difficult choices about loyalty vs. truth

twin_revelation.notes: Emotional core episode exploring how family bonds challenge ideological certainty
